渿字的基本解释

渿
nài
〔渿沛〕ａ。水波貌。ｂ．水声。
〔渿河〕水名，在中国山东省新泰市。

渿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nài］
［《廣韻》奴带切，去泰，泥。］
(1)水波貌。
(2)水声。

渿字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　渿； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页636第02
【唐韻】奴帶切【集韻】乃帶切，?音奈。【說文】沛之也。【玉篇】㴎沛，水波貌。

渿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
渿字的起名意思

暂无。

渿
Basic explanation of words
渿
nài
[Lu Pei] a. Water wave appearance. b. The sound of water.
〔渿河〕The name of the water is in Xintai City, Shandong Province, China.
渿
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nài］
["Guangyun" Slave cut, go to Thailand, mud. ]
(1) Water wave appearance.
(2) Water sound.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Shuizi Department】　渿; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 636 02
[Tang Yun] Slave belt cutting [Ji Yun] is belt cutting,? Yinnai. [Said the text] Pei Zhi also. [Jade articles] 㴎pei, the appearance of water waves.
